hasDitaContent.@value: Minocycline increases the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Minocycline   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with minocycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Acitretin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   minocycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both minocycline and alcohol can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  minocycline  and  alcohol  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both minocycline and alectinib can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  minocycline  and  alectinib  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Alitretinoin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   minocycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Oral antacids greatly decrease the absorption of oral minocycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Oral   antacids   greatly   decrease   the absorption of   oral   minocycline .  Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours .

hasDitaContent.@value: Bismuth greatly decreases the efficacy of minocycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 hours.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Bismuth   greatly   decreases   the efficacy of   minocycline .  Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 hours .
